overview:
Heather Fernandez currently serves as Vice President of Agent Services. Previously, Heather served as Vice President of Marketing and was responsible for developing Trulia’s marketing and communications strategy. Her experience includes roles as an Associate at Morgan Stanley and Director of the Impact Group at Blanc & Otus Public Relations. She’s also played in the political sphere, having served as Deputy Press Secretary for Senator John McCain’s 2000 presidential bid and as U.S. House of Representatives press secretary for various members of Congress.

Heather received her B.A. in political science from the University of California, Berkeley and her M.B.A. from Stanford University.

milestones.description: Became Vice President of Agent Services at Trulia
